H0.text: Atmosphere is the thin layer of rock on Earth's surface.

H1.text: Hemisphere is the thin layer of rock on Earth's surface.

H2.text: Hydrosphere is the thin layer of rock on Earth's surface.

H3.text: Lithosphere is the thin layer of rock on Earth's surface.

A4.text: The lithosphere is the rigid, outermost rocky shell of a terrestrial planet or natural satellite.

A5.text: The crust and upper mantle are distinguished on the basis of chemistry and mineralogy.
